methods.name: PerformAttack
methods.comment: / Handles the attack logic, differs depending on type of attack ( ex melee, ranged etc )

methods.name: GetAttackActivationDistance
methods.comment: Get attack activation distance ( returns the attack range if the activation distance has not been set )

methods.name: GetAttackAngle
methods.comment: Get angle needed for this attack to hit

methods.name: GetDamageType
methods.comment: Get damage type for this attack

properties.name: mStopsMovement
properties.comment: True if this attack stops movement

properties.name: mDamage
properties.comment: How much damage to do when hitting

properties.name: mDamageType
properties.comment: Damage type that this attack uses

properties.name: mAttackAngle
properties.comment: Angle that target must be within in order to hit with attack ( 180 = full circle hit area )
